Name: Zee Dee
Ingredients: 40 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Aged rum and sherry with a delicate hint of apple fruit.
History: Created in January 2009 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Zee Dee contains 162 calories
